name: Thundertail

response: Thundertail is an eco-friendly troll who dreams of forests and wind farms. He prefers building towers that sway like dancers rather than digging into the earth. However, when it comes to crypto, Thundertail is truly unstoppable—his obsession knows no bounds, scaling peaks with unwavering fervor.
